note.p: References: P Fontes da Costa, 'The Culture of Curiosity at The Royal Society in the first half of the eighteenth century', NR 2002 vo l56 pp 147-166
Notes: On PL for 1760 but not after. Letter from Berkshire Records Office (08/07/1972), which holds the family papers of the Stevens family state year of death as 1760. This fellow was a barrister.
